name: Tower Defense (WIP)
description:
Welcome To This Tower Defense Game! I Plan To Update This Game Weekly This Is Only Version 1.0! (Early Access)

Controls: W A S D To Pan The Camera Forward Left Right And Backwards, And Use Your Scroll Wheel To Zoom In And Out!

Known Bugs: Shop Being Half Your Screen (At least On My Monitor)

Report Bugs (Discord): Debug.Log("Cosmics")#7187

Next Update: 1.1 New Turret! Fixing Bugs And Visual Improvements (Plus A Little Extra)
